item.title: Depersonalization
item.description:
Title: Depersonalization
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie , RPG , Strategy
Developer: MeowNature
Publisher: Gamera Games
Franchise: Gamera Games
Release Date: Aug 8, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Dec 19, 2022




About This Game

Depersonalization is a COC-like RPG. TRPG! Dice! Cthulhu! Bad End! Multi-branch! A different world starting from zero!
The game consists of multiple modules, each of which has multiple endings and branch routes, striving to build a diverse, themed world.



  • Players can create a variety of characters, and advance the story through free exploration, investigation, reasoning, selection and other actions, and finally reach the end.



  • No rigid growth system, all attribute are served with narrative.
  • Character's attributes will influence the direction of the story, which allows players to experience a more multi-faceted plot. Maybe someone with low attributes is more likely to trigger incredible events.



  • There will be a lot of choices in the story module. Different players can reach various plots and endings. These experiences eventually come together and form a complete story with ups and downs.
  • But it is worth mentioning that you are playing a role, and the character's 'personality' and 'experience' will influence your choices.
  • No matter investigation modules, infinite modules,plain text modules or strange story modules, it will be supported in different modes.


    • Completely break away from the traditional battle template. Flexible options in the battle will allow you to create different worlds of their own.

    We are the prisoners of fate. However, occasionally we can make a big difference and create miracles!




Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

item.title: Dungeons & Degenerate Gamblers
item.description:
Title: Dungeons & Degenerate Gamblers
Genre: Casual , Indie , RPG , Strategy
Developer: Purple Moss Collectors
Publisher: Yogscast Games
Franchise: Yogscast Games
Release Date: Aug 8, 2024




About This Game

Dungeons & Degenerate Gamblers - A Blackjack Roguelike Adventure



Begin your adventure in a tavern that is home to a unique, corrupted version of blackjack you have never played before. You will need to pick up the rules and adapt to them as you progress through the tavern, challenging a colourful cast of blackjack-addicted townspeople. Discover the mystery of who runs this twisted casino as you progress through the tavern to take them down!



Pick a suit: hearts for healing, spades to offer you some protection, diamonds for more currency for shop purchases, or clubs for extra damage. Remove cards from your deck as you progress. Pick up more aces and face cards, or fill your deck with tarot cards, business cards, birthday cards, hall passes and more!



Make your way through the tavern challenging patrons, purchasing additional cards for your deck, resting up when your health gets low, opening boosters packs, participating in minigames and much more! Take on the run-based deckbuilding roguelike challenge, with endless possibilities for unique and interesting decks!



Features
  • Unique play styles based around card suits
  • Ascend or descend through the tavern over and over by unlocking new starter decks when you complete runs for entirely new ways to play
  • Discover incredible rule-breaking synergies in order to defeat the house edge.
  • Over 300 unique cards!
  • 60 characters to defeat
  • Use unique chips to gain advantage and activate special cards
  • Minigames and events to gain more chips or enhance your deck
  • Unique grimy pixel art aesthetic
  • All the degeneracy from a seedy casino but with no risk to your finances, mental health, or your loved ones




Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

Linux

item.title: KELDER Demo
item.description:
Title: KELDER
Genre: Adventure , Indie
Developer: THOs Dev , Mad Muffin Studios
Publisher: THOs Dev
Release Date: Coming soon




About This Game

Trapped in the ominous depths of a post-Soviet basement, you must navigate a chilling survival horror experience where every step unravels more about the dark history that lies within. "KELDER" plunges you into a labyrinth of fear and mystery, where many scavengers once lost in secret, leaving behind clues and horrors that defy explanation.

Key Features:


Unravel Mysteries: Was this basement a site of sinister experiments or a nexus of unexplained anomalies? Discover the truth as you explore the eerie remnants of Soviet-era research.

Survival Horror Atmosphere:


Encounter strange and terrifying entities as you make your way through the basement. The chilling environment and haunting soundscape will keep you on edge.

Environmental Storytelling:


Unearth the stories of past adventurers through letters and environmental clues. Each discovery brings you closer to understanding the fate of those who vanished before you.

Puzzle Solving:


Find keys, solve puzzles, and unlock doors to progress. Each step forward may reveal more about the basement's dark secrets or lead you deeper into danger.

Immersive Walking Simulator:


Experience a tense and atmospheric journey where thorough exploration is key. The detailed environment invites you to uncover every hidden corner.

Unique Gameplay Every Time:


Every game offers a new experience with randomized events and encounters. No two playthroughs are the same, ensuring that each journey into the basement is uniquely terrifying.

Gameplay:


Awaken in a mysterious basement, with nothing but your wits to guide you. As you explore, gather keys and solve puzzles to unlock doors and reveal the basement's secrets. Letters and environmental details provide crucial hints about the dark experiments and anomalies that took place here. Beware of the strange entities that roam the halls—they are always watching, waiting for a chance to strike.

Objective:


Your goal is to escape the basement by piecing together its history and surviving its dangers. Navigate through eerie corridors, solve complex puzzles, and outwit or evade the terrifying entities that lurk in the shadows. Will you uncover the truth and find your way out, or become another lost soul in the depths of KELDER?

Can you survive the horrors and escape the depths? "KELDER" awaits those brave enough to uncover its secrets.



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Dried Bodies: There are scenes featuring old, desiccated bodies which may be disturbing to some players.

Monsters: Some creatures in the game are depicted with severe physical deformities, such as missing legs or dislocated jaws.

Blood Splatters: The game includes instances of blood splatter which may be unsettling.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 (2.7 GHz 4 Core) / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X (3.5 GHz 4 Core) or equivalent
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (req. 6GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (req. 6GB VRAM) / Intel ARC A380
    • Storage: 8 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel i7-8700 (3.7 GHz 6 Core) / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X (3.7 GHz 8 Core) or equivalent
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 Super (req. 6GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT (req. 6GB VRAM) / Intel ARC A770
    • Storage: 8 GB available space

item.title: Prince of Persia The Lost Crown
item.description:
Title: Prince of Persia The Lost Crown
Genre: Action , Adventure
Developer: Ubisoft Montpellier
Publisher: Ubisoft
Franchise: Prince of Persia
Release Date: Aug 8, 2024




About This Game

UNLEASH YOUR INNER WARRIOR

Use your Time Powers, combat, and platforming skills to perform deadly combos and defeat time-corrupted enemies and mythological creatures.

LOSE YOURSELF IN THE PRODIGIOUS MOUNT QAF

Discover a cursed Persian-inspired world filled with larger-than-life landmarks and explore a variety of highly detailed biomes, each with their own identity, wonder, and danger.

LIVE AN EPIC ADVENTURE

Immerse yourself in a Persian mythological​ fantasy through an intriguing and original story as you use your wits to solve puzzles, find hidden treasures, and complete quests to learn more about this corrupted place.

System Requirements

    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 (2GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT (4GB VRAM)
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 30 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit only)

    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 (4GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT (4GB VRAM)
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 30 GB available space

item.title: Worshippers of Cthulhu Demo
item.description:
Title: Worshippers of Cthulhu Demo
Genre: Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Crazy Goat Games
Publisher: Crytivo
Franchise: Crytivo
Release Date: Aug 8, 2024




About This Demo

Step into the shoes of a cult leader in the demo for Worshippers of Cthulhu. In this demo, you'll get a taste of the base mechanics that define the full experience, including a comprehensive tutorial, the entire first island, and key game systems.

Lead the Cult of Cthulhu: Decide the fate of your followers as you perform eldritch rituals and build your city in a world teetering on the edge of sanity and madness. Will you be able to withstand the horrors that await?



Not a Harbinger of Destruction, but a Herald of Rebirth: Your goal isn't to sow chaos, but to guide humanity towards an inevitable cosmic evolution. Through awakening Cthulhu, you’ll transcend the trivialities of human existence and usher in a new order in the universe.

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/2_EN.png

Shape the Destiny of Your Followers: As a cult leader, every decision you make - whether commanding your followers to work, conquer, or engage in dark rituals—directly influences their fate and the success of your cult. Manage the intricacies of daily cult life, from proclaiming dogmas to leading rituals, all while working towards the ultimate goal: awakening your god.



Establish and Expand Your Cult's Influence: The strong survive in Cthulhu's world. In this demo, you'll start by building and expanding your base on the first island, managing resources, production chains, and your workforce. Prepare to explore perilous ruins and unravel the mysteries hidden within, while your growing city serves as a testament to your cult's strength.



Engage with Lovecraftian Entities: Conduct rituals to communicate with the Great One, Dagon, and other entities from the Lovecraftian mythos. These rituals will grant you knowledge and supernatural blessings, essential for expanding your city and growing your power.



Conquer, Convert, or Sacrifice: In a world where non-believers are mere resources, you must choose how to deal with them—will you conquer, pillage, sacrifice, or convert them? Your strategy will shape your destiny.



Unravel the Mysteries: Begin your journey with limited knowledge and gradually uncover the dark secrets of the supernatural realm. The eerie atmosphere, inspired by Lovecraft’s iconic style, will immerse you as you delve deeper into the mysteries that await.



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The game is about leading a cult of Cthulhu - mystical creature known from 1920 american literature



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
